1. Make sure junit works.
2. For Ant, add to Machine classpath following:
      ANT_HOME =  "ant home directory"
      JAVA_HOME =  "jdk directory"
3. Add all relevant .jar , .war , .ear  files  inside /lib directory of ant
4. Add paths of  jars & db2java.zip inside build.xml
5. Run ANT


Thanks & Regards,

Let me rephrase my question:
I have a web app (using JBuilder 5 and Ant). I have a JUnitTest for this
app, and I want the build process of the main project to run the AllTests
for it/
Where can I get information on 'how to'?
Thanks
